AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Census and Excise assistant
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was once an assistant at the Census and Excise office in Seyda Neen. [PAWN_possessive] time there came to an abrupt end after the offices prized platter was found to be missing. [PAWN_nameDef] swears it was that prisoner from Cyrodiil, but [PAWN_possessive] claims fell on deaf ears.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Dock hand
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: The East Empire Company had a great need for skilled dock hands, mostly because they deemed themselves above the employment of slaves. For [PAWN_nameDef], having suffered head trauma from [PAWN_possessive] time in The Vivec City Arena, this was the perfect job.
